entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use background Service With SignlarR In Blazor #109711
  • Dynamic CoreCLR embedding? #109704
  • System.Threading.Thread.StartCallback() - System.NullReferenceException #109697
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/VJ/MultipleException/MultipleException.cmd #109693
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostTests.CreateDefaultBuilder_DoesNotChangeContentRootIfCurrentDirectoryIsWindowsSystemDirectory #109692
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/MethodImpl/CovariantReturns/UnitTest/UnitTestDelegates/UnitTestDelegates.cmd #109691

Closed

  • Add DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes.AllMethods/.AllFields/.AllEvents/etc #88512
    10.0.0
  • API request: Add support for Authenticode code signing #34042
  • nibblemapmacros do a linear scan #93550
    10.0.0
  • BitArray.LeftShift(Int32) Method is broken #73094
    Future
  • UnsafeAccessorAttribute fails to access volatile field #109665
    10.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not check for Transfer-Encoding: chunked on response properly #63053
    Future
  • Add debugger display to CancellationTokenSource #105698
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify usage of the installer and shared framework SDKs based on improvements in the tooling #109710
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ignore modopts/modreqs for `UnsafeAccessor` field targets #109709
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.x
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109706
    area-System.Security
  • Pass BaseOS property down to the inner build as well #109705
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove `netcoreapp >= 7.0` condition #109701
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Define a DllMain for native AOT shared libraries #109699
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #109698
    area-GC-mono
  • Add a diagnostic mode for ArrayPool.Shared #109695
    area-System.Runtime

Merged

  • Implement `DAMT.*WithInherited` #109608
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] add v2 ExecutionManager contract for NibbleMap change #109654
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Slight clean-up of mock descriptors test helpers #109651
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ignore modopts/modreqs for `UnsafeAccessor` field targets #109694
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 10.0.0
  • Use IsNative metadata to exclude native shared libs #109683
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark some intrinsics as must-expand for NAOT due to ILScanner dependencies #109609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: tail merge returns with multiple statements #109670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile instead of USERPROFILE #108559
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109510
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.1
  • JIT: enable tail merge for try exits #109661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for (experimental) profile-based trimming #108049
    Hackathon, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix native AOT repro project #109700
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update IHttpClientLogger.cs and IHttpClientAsyncLogger.cs remarks #109618
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution

Updated

  • [EventTrace] AddEventPipe filter data parsing #109624
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add left-handed spherical and cylindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, NO-SQUASH, Hackathon, area-Infrastructure
  • Build the cdac as part of clr.tools instead of as a prereq to the runtime native build #109598
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add support for deterministic compilation #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add ObsoleteAttribute and EditorBrowsable(Never) to DynamicDependency.Condition #107104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109690
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.116, windows: 131.0.6778.33 #109678
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Support runtime-async instance methods on structs #2766
  • [RuntimeAsync] Validate and fix support for arm64, x86 and arm32 #2764

Closed

  • [RuntimeAsync] arm64/x86/arm32 support #2765

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Runtime Async] Addressing test failures. #2760

Updated

  • [Runtime Async] Add support for shared generics #2755
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge oct 08 #2762
  • [SwiftBindings] added full demangling results with easy accessors and cleaned up the code to require fewer allocations #2761
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet dev-certs issue with creating folder #44797
  • MapStaticAssets on component lib that uses CompressionIncludePatterns cannot compile #44784

Closed

  • Missing net9.0 Templates in Test Environment #44736

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the 9.0 template #44780
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use the BaseOS property as the "portable" rid for building installers #44800
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Forward PgoInstrument down to aspnetcore's build #44798
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Updated template condition in GenerateSdkBundle target #44778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Install .NET 9.0 template #44740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix publishing OCI image as tarball #44693
    Servicing-approved, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Separate build #44699
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2579891 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent copy/paste of password and warn #44761
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Inheritance Margin #75861
  • Area - Convert Anonymous Type to Tuple #75859
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Suppression #75858
  • Area - Inline Method #75856
  • Area - Use Object Initializer #75855
  • Deconstruct receiver ref escape is not considered #75850

Closed

  • Targeting IDE layer projects to .Net Core #45534
    18.0
  • Hovering the dotted vertical line doesn't show namespace for file-scoped namespaces #54740
    Backlog
  • Multiline Comments in C# violate LF line ending of file #54261
    Backlog
  • Go To Definition does not work correctly with delegate and operator #36377
    Backlog
  • IDE shows warnings for invalid code that isn't bound in a ref-only build #54141
    Backlog
  • RenameTracking encountered an error #54124
    Backlog
  • Add code style to sort members by accessibility #54097
    Backlog
  • Incorrect syntax error squiggle in interactive window #53787
    Backlog
  • IDE0079 doesn't show up in VS #52984
    Backlog
  • Code Action menu takes too long to show up #52952
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Server should handle URIs with escaped colons #52606
    Backlog
  • Consider C# Using Directives options when copying and pasting types and "usings" automatically added #52495
    Backlog
  • Some new attributes to mandatory the class to implement the specified static member. #52459
    Backlog
  • [EditorConfig UI] Allow to configuring an entire category of analyzers #52388
    Backlog
  • IDE0066 code fix should support unconditional preprocessor directives #52307
    Backlog
  • Doc comment auto-inserted in verbatim strings with preceding tag #49564
    Backlog
  • Inline type hints jump disruptively #51842
    18.0
  • C# Source Generator - The JSON-RPC connection with the remote party was lost before the request could complete. #75679
  • EditorBrowsable on internal members #51269
    Backlog
  • Usage of explicit operator is not found #50850
    Backlog
  • Avoid converting line to string in TextLineExtension helpers #50706
    Backlog
  • Badly formatted label in "Preview Changes" dialog UI #50681
    Backlog
  • Support nested calls during an active argument completion session #50637
    Backlog
  • Handle Signature Help / argument completion mismatched symbols #50636
    Backlog
  • Support Undo in argument value completion #50635
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Code style rule to allow dedented comments #50631
    Backlog
  • Completion of property patterns doesn't add the colon #50570
    Backlog
  • Convert tuple does not change camelCase element names to PascalCase field names #50505
    Backlog
  • Display 'if else' structure better in structure guidelines #50503
    Backlog
  • Code Analysis Should Not Include GlobalSuppressions.cs #50233
  • Make IEditorFormattingService public #50221
    Backlog
  • Reporting some minor bugs in visual studio #49965
    Backlog
  • IDE0079 is too noisy for cross-targeting projects #49925
    Backlog
  • Provide code-fix for IDE0060 #49868
    Backlog
  • The IDE should generate code at the cursor's position and not at the end of the file #49858
    Backlog
  • Feature: Allow formatted content in description window #49867
    Backlog
  • VS error list often populates with warnings despite suppression by .editorconfig #49718
    Backlog
  • The <see> xml doc tag doesn't create a link in Object Browser #49651
    Backlog
  • Show an indicator when import completion items not included due to cold cache #44175
    Backlog
  • Source Generators: generated file appears empty after re-opening the solution #49521
    Backlog
  • When there is no “using” statement in the class it is introducing a blank new line after namespace causing SA1505 #49497
    Backlog
  • Add metadata to copy inside the editor #49442
    Backlog
  • Offer 'ToDictionary' instead of inserting explicit cast #49208
    Backlog
  • SyntaxGenerator.MethodDeclaration should support generating abstract/extern methods #49192
    Backlog
  • Make `IWorkspaceStatusService.IsFullyLoadedAsync` synchronous #49114
    Backlog
  • intellisense does not show base class library while typing in XML comments #49078
    Backlog
  • [loc] Update comments in XLF #49058
    Backlog
  • Automatically fix curly quotes copy paste #49018
    Backlog
  • Does FileChangeWatcher have a memory leak in its Task continuation chain? #48938
    Backlog
  • IDE code style options should have `hidden` severity by default #48839
    Backlog
  • Convert to switch expression produces wrong code #48829
    Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Backlog
  • Visual Basic line commit hangs the editor while typing #48590
    Backlog
  • Improve F1 help for tokens with multiple uses #48392
    Backlog
  • Ensure that source generators work with Source Browser and/or Rich Navigation #48123
    Backlog
  • Implement hash-resistent equality comparers for types with custom MessagePack serialization #48119
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio does not reload source generator assemblies when they change on disk #48083
    Backlog
  • Supported API warning doesn't work on overloads #48058
    Backlog
  • Move method to partial #48026
    Backlog
  • When invoking a method: optionally automatically fill in argument names & create local variables for them. #48019
    Backlog
  • Upgrade Project fixer should be able to upgrade TargetFramework to support new language versions #47977
    Backlog
  • Replace ObjectReader/Writer with MessagePack serialization when serializing assets #47861
    Backlog
  • Future potential user experience improvements with soft-errors #47849
    Backlog
  • IDE0066 produces (arguably) less readable code for enums when changing to switch expression using or patterns #47521
    Backlog
  • RenameDocument does not fire IVSRefactorNotify or dismiss rename tracking #47048
    Backlog
  • No intellisense for record types if they're declared at the end of a top level program #47042
    17.6 P3
  • Show items from unimported namespaces shows types that are invalid given signature constraints #46768
    Backlog
  • Completion matching does not support abbreviated identifiers #46677
    Backlog
  • Show/Hide member attributes #46633
    Backlog
  • Revisit exclusion of IStreamingFindUsagesPresenter from VisualStudioTestCompositions.LanguageServices #46380
    Backlog
  • In foreach loops, automatically (in debug) add variables that would give iteration # and total iterations planned #46272
    Backlog
  • Consider making `QuickInfoSection.NullabilityAnalysis` public #46254
    Backlog
  • RenameTestHelpers.CreateWorkspaceWithWaiter ignores TestHost parameter value #45890
    Backlog
  • Opening 'Quick Actions' gets unusably slow when file has large number of compile errors #45836
    Backlog
  • Introduce local refactoring generates incorrect code #45790
    Backlog
  • Using `.WithProjectName()` only followed by `MSBuildWorkspace.TryApplyChanges(newSolution)` does not update `Workspace.CurrentSolution` #45710
    Backlog
  • Include implicitly called methods (e.g. an overloaded "ToString()") in the CodeLens reference count #45631
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Allow more code actions to execute on client via WorkspaceEdit once LSP bug is fixed #45623
    Backlog
  • Completion isn't triggered automatically for generic methods #45107
    Backlog
  • RenameDocumentAsync() should return error when invalid characters. #44515
    Backlog
  • Add code snippet "cr" for Console.ReadLine(); #44499
    Backlog
  • InlineDeclaration doesn't trigger on top-level statement #44429
    Backlog
  • Handle FAR/Inline rename for references in global suppression parameters #44401
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in CSharpCodeGenerationService.AddStatementsWorker() with top-level statements #44387
    Backlog
  • Intellisense listing members for wrong class inside lambda (VS 2019 16.5.5) #44248
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense is defaulting to the incorrect value when inside a Lambda Expression #44182
    Backlog
  • Codegen for spreading a null array does not throw NullReferenceException #74668

PullRequests

Created

  • VB: Check overload resolution priority for basic scenarios involving methods #75862
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Fix formatting of simplify-linq-expression #75860
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prefer array to ReadOnlySpan over Span #75853
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make VBCSCompiler pipe name insensitive to casing of the path #75852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move HasHome out of Binder #75851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue where doc comment completion was coming up inside a string literal #75857
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24555.12 #75794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Re-add the IEntryPointFinderService. It is used through IVT #75854
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Optimize single spread of IEnumerable to array #75847
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add runtime async design doc #75816
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use `IsManagedType` for determining which state machine hoisted locals to clear #75841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update parsing code for conditional access expressions #75849
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create features/DictionaryExpression branch and resurrect parsing for those expressions #75846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow escaping refs to implicit rvalue temporaries #75830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Parse directives in trailing trivia as skipped tokens trivia #75724
    Area-Compilers, VSCode
  • Make MaxSupportedLangVersion calculation dynamic #75795
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, json #58883
  • OpenApi ignores JsonNumberHandling.WriteAsString #58882
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58880
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58879
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58878
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query #58877
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, single_query #58876
  • Preload Blazor WebAssembly resources to improve startup time #58875
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Prototype background thread rendering and multi-threaded runtime for Blazor WebAssembly #58874
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor Explicit Rendering #58871
  • Custom input component not behaving as expected #58869
    10.0-preview1

Closed

  • SignalR Hub Method Invocation Activities are not Recorded while auto Instrumentation is Configured. #58861
  • /Accounts pages don't render and don't throw any errors #58858
  • AddNewtonsoftJson,Causing the middleware to immediately return to the client after executing Next() #58651
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.ReadJwtToken is not reading the issuer #58835
  • Blazor Web App / Auto Mode / Counter button not responsive if switch to that page quickly #58860
  • Blazor Streaming Rendering does not show intermediate state when @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "group1")] is used #58813

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix branding #58884
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Fix package for Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Razor.Design #58881
    area-infrastructure
  • feat: analyzer and codeFix for kestrel setup `ListenOptions.Listen(IPAddress.Any)` usage #58872
    area-infrastructure, analyzer
  • remove redundant initializer in HttpValidationProblemDetails #58864
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24560.6 #58862
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Fix remote asset url condition and look for the PGO'd archive when in a PGO vertical #58873
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • chore: fixed missed conditional theory for testing named pipe #58849
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58846
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [MAUI] Can't clear RadioButton Selection #25780
  • Calendar selected in device settings not available in CultureInfo #25779
  • [iOS] Fix Issue22035 so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25778
  • [iOS] Fix Issue11896 so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25777
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25776
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25775
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix HeaderFooterGridHorizontal so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25774
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #25773
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Role "Button" is not announced by VoiceOver for every Span that has a GestureRecognizer #25764
    Backlog
  • Role "Button" not announced by TalkBack for Spans with GestureRecognizer #25763
    Backlog

Closed

  • What to do with all the things .NET 9 has now broken? Where is the official .NET 9 Maui code to compare with and find where things have moved? #25767
  • [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #12213
    Backlog
  • [Windows] The screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage. #25518
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Rendering problem when Image and Label are placed inside StackLayout #25769
    Backlog
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Every quit and exit method throws an exception #24486
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] Windows debugger crashes often with SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 5.4, works with Preview 4.1 #25562
  • Add Maui 8.0.93 SR9.3 to list of Versions for github issues (etc) #25765
  • Android - NullReferenceException thrown from ItemContentView #23394
  • CollectionView Programmatic-Selection is not updated when binding the selectedItem #25551

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed the hide password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #25768
    community ✨, area-controls-entry

Merged

  • Update sr1 with ga #25752
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25711
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Setup lane to run CV2 and CV1 tests #25719
    area-testing
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #25731
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Update bug-report.yml #25771

Updated

  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - improvements #25702
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, t/a11y
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 4 #25751
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed the Label height within VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #25748
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically throws an exception #25743
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android - fix #25760
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dateOnly.ToDateTime(timeOnly)` should be transformed to `EF.Functions.DateTimeFromParts` #35076
  • Discriminator with default name but different type not generated correctly in migration snapshots #35075
  • Support or not to NotMapped Property Map to Entity Property #35071
  • Facing this issue on EF core 8.0 #35070

Closed

  • In SQLite, EF converts the DateTime value "" to 0001-01-01 00:00:00, not null #34773

PullRequests

Created

  • Updating Cosmos version, including using new public APIs #35074

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0-staging' => 'release/9.0' #35078
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0-staging' => 'release/8.0' #35077

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35054
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35050
  • Move NonNullableConventionState to CoreAnnotationNames #35020
